name: Shakir
text: Ha Mim.

name: Shakir
text: I swear by the Book that makes things clear:

name: Shakir
text: Surely We have made it an Arabic Quran that you may understand.

name: Shakir
text: And surely it is in the original of the Book with Us, truly elevated, full of wisdom.

name: Shakir
text: What! shall We then turn away the reminder from you altogether because you are an extravagant people?

name: Shakir
text: And how many a prophet have We sent among the ancients.

name: Shakir
text: And there came not to them a prophet but they mocked at him.

name: Shakir
text: Then We destroyed those who were stronger than these in prowess, and the case of the ancients has gone before,

name: Shakir
text: And if you should ask them, Who created the heavens and the earth? they would most certainly say: The Mighty, the Knowing One, has created them;

name: Shakir
text: He Who made the earth a resting-place for you, and made in it ways for you that you may go aright;

name: Shakir
text: And He Who sends down water from the cloud according to a measure, then We raise to life thereby a dead country, even thus shall you be brought forth;

name: Shakir
text: And He Who created pairs of all things, and made for you of the ships and the cattle what you ride on,

name: Shakir
text: That you may firmly sit on their backs, then remember the favor of your Lord when you are firmly seated thereon, and say: Glory be to Him Who made this subservient to us and we were not able to do it

name: Shakir
text: And surely to our Lord we must return.

name: Shakir
text: And they assign to Him a part of His servants; man, to be sure, is clearly ungrateful.

name: Shakir
text: What! has He taken daughters to Himself of what He Himself creates and chosen you to have sons?

name: Shakir
text: And when one of them is given news of that of which he sets up as a likeness for the Beneficent Allah, his face becomes black and he is full of rage.

name: Shakir
text: What! that which is made in ornaments and which in contention is unable to make plain speech!

name: Shakir
text: And they make the angels-- them who are the servants of the Beneficent Allah-- female (divinities). What! did they witness their creation? Their evidence shall be written down and they shall be questioned.

name: Shakir
text: And they say: If the Beneficent Allah had pleased, we should never have worshipped them. They have no knowledge of this; they only lie.

name: Shakir
text: Or have We given them a book before it so that they hold fast to it?

name: Shakir
text: Nay! they say: We found our fathers on a course, and surely we are guided by their footsteps.

name: Shakir
text: And thus, We did not send before you any warner in a town, but those who led easy lives in it said: Surely we found our fathers on a course, and surely we are followers of their footsteps.

name: Shakir
text: (The warner) said: What! even if I bring to you a better guide than that on which you found your fathers? They said: Surely we are unbelievers in that with which you are sent.

name: Shakir
text: So We inflicted retribution on them, then see how was the end of the rejecters.

name: Shakir
text: And when Ibrahim said to his father and his people: Surely I am clear of what you worship,

name: Shakir
text: Save Him Who created me, for surely He will guide me.

name: Shakir
text: And he made it a word to continue in his posterity that they may return.

name: Shakir
text: Nay! I gave them and their fathers to enjoy until there came to them the truth and an Apostle making manifest (the truth).

name: Shakir
text: And when there came to them the truth they said: This is magic, and surely we are disbelievers in it.

name: Shakir
text: And they say: Why was not this Quran revealed to a man of importance in the two towns?

name: Shakir
text: Will they distribute the mercy of your Lord? We distribute among them their livelihood in the life of this world, and We j have exalted some of them above others in degrees, that some of them may take others in subjection; and the mercy of your Lord is better than what they amass.

name: Shakir
text: And were it not that all people had been a single nation, We would certainly have assigned to those who disbelieve in the Beneficent Allah (to make) of silver the roofs of their houses and the stairs by which they ascend.

name: Shakir
text: And the doors of their houses and the couches on which they recline,

name: Shakir
text: And (other) embellishments of gold; and all this is naught but provision of this world's life, and the hereafter is with your Lord only for those who guard (against evil).

name: Shakir
text: And whoever turns himself away from the remembrance of the Beneficent Allah, We appoint for him a Shaitan, so he becomes his associate.

name: Shakir
text: And most surely they turn them away from the path, and they think that they are guided aright:

name: Shakir
text: Until when he comes to Us, he says: O would that between me and you there were the distance of the East and the West; so evil is the associate!

name: Shakir
text: And since you were unjust, it will not profit you this day that you are sharers in the chastisement.

name: Shakir
text: What! can you then make the deaf to hear or guide the blind and him who is in clear error?

name: Shakir
text: But if We should take you away, still We shall inflict retribution on them;

name: Shakir
text: Rather We will certainly show you that which We have promised them; for surely We are the possessors of full power over them.

name: Shakir
text: Therefore hold fast to that which has been revealed to you; surely you are on the right path.

name: Shakir
text: And most surely it is a reminder for you and your people, and you shall soon be questioned.

name: Shakir
text: And ask those of Our apostles whom We sent before you: Did We ever appoint gods to be worshipped besides the Beneficent Allah?

name: Shakir
text: And certainly We sent Musa with Our communications to Firon and his chiefs, so he said: Surely I am the apostle of the Lord of the worlds.

name: Shakir
text: But when he came to them with Our signs, lo! they laughed at them.

name: Shakir
text: And We did not show them a sign but it was greater than its like, and We overtook them with chastisement that they may turn.

name: Shakir
text: And they said: O magician! call on your Lord for our sake, as He has made the covenant with you; we shall surely be the followers of the right way.

name: Shakir
text: But when We removed from them the chastisement, lo! they broke the pledge.

name: Shakir
text: And Firon proclaimed amongst his people: O my people! is not the kingdom of Egypt mine? And these rivers flow beneath me; do you not then see?

name: Shakir
text: Nay! I am better than this fellow, who is contemptible, and who can hardly speak distinctly:

name: Shakir
text: But why have not bracelets of gold been put upon him, or why have there not come with him angels as companions?

name: Shakir
text: So he incited his people to levity and they obeyed him: surely they were a transgressing people.

name: Shakir
text: Then when they displeased Us, We inflicted a retribution on them, so We drowned them all together,

name: Shakir
text: And We made them a precedent and example to the later generations.

name: Shakir
text: And when a description of the son of Marium is given, lo! your people raise a clamor thereat.

name: Shakir
text: And they say: Are our gods better, or is he? They do not set it forth to you save by way of disputation; nay, they are a contentious people.

name: Shakir
text: He was naught but a servant on whom We bestowed favor, and We made him an example for the children of Israel.

name: Shakir
text: And if We please, We could make among you angels to be successors in the land.

name: Shakir
text: And most surely it is a knowledge of the hour, therefore have no doubt about it and follow me: this is the right path.

name: Shakir
text: And let not the Shaitan prevent you; surely he is your j open enemy.

name: Shakir
text: And when Isa came with clear arguments he said: I have come to you indeed with wisdom, and that I may make clear to you part of what you differ in; so be careful of (your duty to) Allah and obey me:

name: Shakir
text: Surely Allah is my Lord and your Lord, therefore serve Him; this is the right path:

name: Shakir
text: But parties from among them differed, so woe to those who were unjust because of the chastisement of a painful day.

name: Shakir
text: Do they wait for aught but the hour, that it should come! upon them all of a sudden while they do not perceive?

name: Shakir
text: The friends shall on that day be enemies one to another, except those who guard (against evil).

name: Shakir
text: O My servants! there is no fear for you this day, nor shall you grieve.

name: Shakir
text: Those who believed in Our communications and were submissive:

name: Shakir
text: Enter the garden, you and your wives; you shall be made happy.

name: Shakir
text: There shall be sent round to them golden bowls and drinking-cups and therein shall be what their souls yearn after and (wherein) the eyes shall delight, and you shall abide therein.

name: Shakir
text: And this is the garden which you are given as an inheritance on account of what you did.

name: Shakir
text: For you therein are many fruits of which you shall eat.

name: Shakir
text: Surely the guilty shall abide in the chastisement of hell.

name: Shakir
text: It shall not be abated from them and they shall therein be despairing.

name: Shakir
text: And We are not unjust to them, but they themselves were unjust.

name: Shakir
text: And they shall call out: O Malik! let your Lord make an end of us. He shall say: Surely you shall tarry.

name: Shakir
text: Certainly We have brought you the truth, but most of you are averse to the truth.

name: Shakir
text: Or have they settled an affair? Then surely We are the settlers.

name: Shakir
text: Or do they think that We do not hear what they conceal and their secret discourses? Aye! and Our apostles with them write down.

name: Shakir
text: Say: If the Beneficent Allah has a son, I am the foremost of those who serve.

name: Shakir
text: Glory to the Lord of the heavens and the earth, the Lord of power, from what they describe.

name: Shakir
text: So leave them plunging into false discourses and sporting until they meet their day which they are threatened with.

name: Shakir
text: And He it is Who is Allah in the heavens and Allah in the earth; and He is the Wise, the Knowing.

name: Shakir
text: And blessed is He Whose is the kingdom of the heavens and the earth and what is between them, and with Him is the knowledge of the hour, and to Him shall you be brought back.

name: Shakir
text: And those whom they call upon besides Him have no authority for intercession, but he who bears witness of the truth and they know (him).

name: Shakir
text: And if you should ask them who created them, they would certainly say: Allah. Whence are they then turned back?

name: Shakir
text: Consider his cry: O my Lord! surely they are a people who do not believe.

name: Shakir
text: So turn away from them and say, Peace, for they shall soon come to know.
